Verdana 12 FF000000
Verdana 16 FFFF0000
Verdana 16 FFFFFFFF

Verdana 12 FFFFFFFF
Verdana 12 FFFFFFFF
1
0 200 300 550 320
100% 20 0 FF888888
Center 0 3 100% 20 ComBot by Tehtsuo/Vendan
FF000000 r40 0 40 20 Close
endscript ComBot
FF000000 r120 0 40 20 Hide
if ${UIElement[ComBotTab@ComBot].Visible} { UIElement[ComBotTab@ComBot]:Hide This:SetText[Show] } else { UIElement[ComBotTab@ComBot]:Show This:SetText[Hide] }
FF000000 r80 0 40 20 Help
timedcommand 0 "OSExecute http://eve.isxgames.com/wiki/index.php?title=ComBot#Experimental_Installation"
FF000000 0 0 40 20 Run
if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.ComBot.Paused} { Script[ComBot].VariableScope.ComBot:Resume } else { Script[ComBot].VariableScope.ComBot:Pause }
0 5 100% 100%
FF000000 1 FFFFFFFF 0 0 100% 100%
This:SetLeftClickThru[TRUE]
FF000000 0 0 100% 90%
FF000000 1% 92% 48% 6%
variable int counter Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetComBot_Mode[${This.SelectedItem.Value}] for ( counter:Set[1] ; ${counter} <= ${This.Items} ; counter:Inc ) { Script[ComBot].VariableScope.${This.OrderedItem[${counter}].Value}:Stop } if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.UI.Reloaded} { if !${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.ComBot.Paused} { Script[ComBot].VariableScope.UI:Update["ComBot", "Paused", "r"] Script[ComBot].VariableScope.ComBot:Pause } }
FF000000 50% 92% 20% 6% Configuration
timedcommand 0 "ui -load \"${Script[ComBot].CurrentDirectory}/behavior/${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.ComBot_Mode}.xml\""
75% 92% 48% 6% Start automatically
if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.AutoStart} { This:SetChecked }
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetAutoStart[${This.Checked}]
FF000000 1 FFFFFFFF 0 0 100% 100%
This:SetLeftClickThru[TRUE]
1% 40% 48% 6% Disable 3D Rendering
if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.Disable3D} { This:SetChecked }
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetDisable3D[${This.Checked}]
1% 48% 48% 6% Disable User Interface
if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.DisableUI} { This:SetChecked }
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetDisableUI[${This.Checked}]
1% 56% 48% 6% Disable Texture Loading
if ${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.DisableTexture} { This:SetChecked }
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common:SetDisableTexture[${This.Checked}]
FF000000 1% 25% 98% 10% Security Settings
timedcommand 0 "ui -load \"&filepath;/ComBotGUI_Security.xml\""

This:SetText[${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Common.Account}]

This:AddItem[No Fleet] variable iterator FleetIterator Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Fleets.Fleets:GetSetIterator[FleetIterator] if ${FleetIterator:First(exists)} { do { This:AddItem[${FleetIterator.Key}] } while ${FleetIterator:Next(exists)} } This.ItemByText[${Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Fleets.Active}]:Select
Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Config.Fleets:SetActive[${This.SelectedItem.Text}] Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Fleets.WingTranslation:Clear Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Fleets.SquadTranslation:Clear

variable string ItemText if ${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItems} { ItemText:Set[${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Text}] Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Dynamic:ActivateMiniMode[${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Value}] UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot]:AddItem[${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Text}, ${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Value}] UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem:Remove UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].ItemByText[${ItemText}]:Select } elseif ${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItems} { ItemText:Set[${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Text}] Script[ComBot].VariableScope.Dynamic:DeactivateMiniMode[${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Value}] UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot]:AddItem[${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Text}, ${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem.Value}] UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItem:Remove UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].ItemByText[${ItemText}]:Select } echo Active ${UIElement[MiniMode_Active@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItems} Inactive ${UIElement[MiniMode_Inactive@MiniMode@ComBotTab@ComBot].SelectedItems}
